comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: Visit of the East Africa Royal Commission on Land and Population, between February 1953 and February 1954. Mr R S Hudson,CMG, had served in Northern Rhodesia from 1919 until about 1950. Sir Frederick Seaford was chairman of Booker Bros McConnell Ltd, a leading sugar producing company. Sir Hugh Dow,GCIE, was the Chairman of the Royal Commission. He had served in the Indian Civil Service (ICS) from 1909 until 1947. Mr Frank Sykes was an agriculturalist and farmer with interests in sisal estates in Tanganyika. ,
